mapper.select: /* AdminMediaMapper.getFileTypeComboList */ SELECT NMCODE_CD AS VALUE , NMCODE_NM AS NAME FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE 1=1 AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '303' AND NMCODE_CD NOT IN ('008', '009') AND NMCODE_CD IN ('018') ORDER BY NMCODE_CD

/* USE : AdminMediaMapper.chkFileType */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '303' AND NMCODE_CD = #{fileType}
AND ( CASE WHEN INSTR(NMCODE_ITEM_1, '⊥') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(NMCODE_ITEM_1 ,1, INSTR(NMCODE_ITEM_1, '⊥') - 1) ELSE NMCODE_ITEM_1 END ) = '날짜중복불가'
/* USE : AdminMediaMapper.getFileCd */ SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(ADVER_FILE_NO), 6000) +1, 4, '0') FROM TB_CM_POS_ADVER_FILE WHERE ADVER_FILE_NO > 6000

/* USE : AdminMediaMapper.dtlInfo */ SELECT ADVER_FILE_NO AS VER_SER_NO , FILE_USE_TYPE AS FILE_TYPE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ADVER_S_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ADVER_E_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS USE_DATE , ADVER_S_DATE AS START_DATE , ADVER_E_DATE AS END_DATE , FILE_DIR , FILE_NM , FILE_EXT , FILE_ORG_NM || '.' || FILE_EXT AS FILE_ORG_NM , FILE_SIZE , FILE_MIME_TYPE , FILE_ORG_NM , FILE_DESC AS VER_SER_NM , USE_YN , REG_DT , DISP_TIME , PROMOTION_CD , NVL2(PROMOTION_CD,(SELECT PROMOTION_NM FROM TB_HQ_PROMO_H thph WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thph.PROMOTION_CD = thpaf.PROMOTION_CD), '') AS PROMOTION_NM , LANG_FG , ADVER_URL FROM TB_CM_POS_ADVER_FILE thpaf WHERE ADVER_FILE_NO = #{verSerNo}

/* USE : AdminMediaMapper.chkDupCnt */ SELECT CASE WHEN INSTR(NMCODE_ITEM_1, '⊥') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(NMCODE_ITEM_1 , INSTR(NMCODE_ITEM_1, '⊥') + 1) ELSE NULL END AS DUP_CNT FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '303' AND NMCODE_CD = #{fileType}

/* AdminMediaMapper.getMediaPlaySeqList */ SELECT ADVER_FILE_NO AS VER_SER_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ADVER_S_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ADVER_E_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS USE_DATE , FILE_DESC AS VER_SER_NM , FILE_USE_TYPE , FILE_SIZE , USE_YN , FILE_ORG_NM || '.' || FILE_EXT AS FILE_ORG_NM , DISP_TIME , DISP_SEQ , LANG_FG FROM TB_CM_POS_ADVER_FILE WHERE 1=1 AND FILE_USE_TYPE = #{fileType} ORDER BY DISP_SEQ

/* USE : AdminMediaMapper.srchStoreList */ SELECT tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD , tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM , tms.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tms.SYS_STAT_FG , tmp.POS_CNT FROM TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_HQ_OFFICE tho , ( SELECT STORE_CD , COUNT(POS_NO) AS POS_CNT FROM TB_MS_POS WHERE USE_YN ='Y' GROUP BY STORE_CD ) tmp WHERE tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD
AND tms.STORE_CD IN ( SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_CM_POS_ADVER_STORE WHERE ADVER_FILE_NO = #{verSerNo} )
AND tms.STORE_CD NOT IN ( SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_CM_POS_ADVER_STORE WHERE ADVER_FILE_NO = #{verSerNo} )
AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeCd}||'%'
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD LIKE '%'||#{storeCd}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_NM LIKE '%'||#{storeNm}||'%'
MINUS SELECT tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD , tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM , tms.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tms.SYS_STAT_FG , tmp.POS_CNT FROM TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_HQ_OFFICE tho , ( SELECT STORE_CD , COUNT(POS_NO) AS POS_CNT FROM TB_MS_POS WHERE USE_YN ='Y' GROUP BY STORE_CD ) tmp WHERE tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD IN ( SELECT B.STORE_CD FROM TB_CM_NMCODE A , TB_MS_STORE B WHERE A.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '238' AND A.NMCODE_ITEM_2 = 'E' AND ((A.NMCODE_ITEM_1 = 'H' AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.NMCODE_NM) OR (A.NMCODE_ITEM_1 = 'S' AND B.STORE_CD = A.NMCODE_NM)) ) UNION SELECT tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD , tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM , tms.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tms.SYS_STAT_FG , tmp.POS_CNT FROM TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_HQ_OFFICE tho , ( SELECT STORE_CD , COUNT(POS_NO) AS POS_CNT FROM TB_MS_POS WHERE USE_YN ='Y' GROUP BY STORE_CD ) tmp WHERE tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD
AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeCd}||'%'
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD LIKE '%'||#{storeCd}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_NM LIKE '%'||#{storeNm}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD IN ( SELECT B.STORE_CD FROM TB_CM_NMCODE A , TB_MS_STORE B WHERE A.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '238' AND A.NMCODE_ITEM_2 = 'I' AND ((A.NMCODE_ITEM_1 = 'H' AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.NMCODE_NM) OR (A.NMCODE_ITEM_1 = 'S' AND B.STORE_CD = A.NMCODE_NM)) ) AND tms.STORE_CD NOT IN ( SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_CM_POS_ADVER_STORE WHERE ADVER_FILE_NO = #{verSerNo} )
ORDER BY HQ_OFFICE_CD , STORE_CD
